name: Lines of sight_Kill the Lights
description:
Control:

move: WASD

aim: mouse

shoot: left click

flashlight on/off: right click

Multiplayer FPS shooter game in low light condition.

NYU Game Center prototype studio week 12

Instructor: Bennett Foddy 

Prompt: Lines of sight.

The game size is too big for itch to handle, so if u want to try it, there is a link to google drive.
